title: Spinach-peas Gravy / Palak Mutter Creamy Kadai
content:
Ingredients: Spinach/ Palak - 1 bowl Soaked cashew nuts - 10 to 15 Green peas / Mutter (frozen) - 1/2 cup Green chillies + Coriander +mint leaves paste - 3 tb sp Butter/ Oil - 2 tb sp Cumin seeds / Jeera - 1 teaspoon Ginger-Garlic paste - 1 teaspoon Asafotida/ hing/ inguva - 1/4 teaspoon Turmeric powder - 1/4 teaspoon Red chilli powder/ paprika - 1/2 teaspoon Cumin / Jeera powder - 1/2 teaspoon Coriander powder - 1/2 teaspoon Garam Masala - 1/2 teaspoon Salt - as per taste Procedure:
  • Blanch Palak/ SpinachÂ 
  • In a medium sized pot of water to a boil over high heat
  • Wash spinach leaves
  • Put the spinach leaves in the boiling water, and allow them to boil for 30 seconds to 1 minute until you see a bright green color.
  • Take out them & transfer in cold water bowl
  • Transfer into mixer grinder make smooth paste. Keep aside
  • Add butter/ oil in medium heated pan
  • Add jeera , Ginger-Garlic paste and mixed chilli paste( green chillies,mint and coriander)
  • Saute 1 min
  • Add Mutter/ Green peas saute for one min
  • Add spices turmeric,asafotida,salt,red chilly powder,cumin powder, coriander powder and garam MasalaÂ 
  • Saute one min
  • Add spinach water leftover paste in mixer grinder. Mix well
  • Add spinach paste and water
  • Let it boil and stir occasionally
  • Make cashew paste
  • When gravy boiling add cashew nuts paste
  • Mix it well and boil for one min
  • Transfer Spinach Peas Gravy/ Palak Mutter Creamy Kadai in serving bowl/Kadai
  • Spread cream/ Cashew nuts paste on toppings of Gravy
  • Serve it with Naan/ Kulcha/Chapathi/ RotiğŸ˜€ğŸ˜‹
